update t_goods_check_list
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsid = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},

goodscheckid = #{goodscheckid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_goods_check_list set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsid = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, marketnum = #{marketnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, returnnum = #{returnnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stocknum = #{stocknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typeid = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, goodscheckid = #{goodscheckid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delflag = #{delflag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
